title: Aanuoluwatofunmi
author: Aanuoluwatofunmi
content: The first five days in this month of January has been a ride on what can be termed as best 2023 experience as with bitcoin whch can got the attention of every potential bitcoin investors to have confidence and be determined for choosing bitcoin over other cryptocurrencies within this few days to why bitcoin is the most preferred decentralized digital currency this new year together with its best of breaking news within the first five days in this year 2023, I got the inspiration for creating this thread from this post tilted  bitcointalk rewind 2022 when the list of 2022 bitcointalk major events were publish and i take it a challenge to as well bring up some ideas and achievements about the first five days of this year's experience with bitcoin.These are trending news and reports about bitcoin this new year and some major events or happenings around the world with bitcoin, you're free as well to add any additional information or best observed moment with bitcoin in this new year 2023 on this thread as well.1. One thousands Ukraine pharmacies have implemented the acceptance of bitcoin in making paymentshttps://www.google.com/amp/s/cointelegraph.com/news/ukrainian-pharmacies-enable-crypto-payments-via-binance-pay/amp2. More than forty five thousands companies and industries have invested in bitcoin in Brazilhttps://twitter.com/BitcoinMagazine/status/1610373025958092801?t=eSj1uaxcfNv6356GFv2RGg&s=193. Presidential aspirant in Argentina Javier Gerardo Milei is in support for bitcoin adoption because je believes it's one of the ways to avoid effect of inflation through a political influence https://watcher.guru/news/will-argentina-elect-a-pro-bitcoin-president-this-year4. Lugano, Switzerland listed places and businesses that accepts bitcoin for payment.https://twitter.com/BTC_Archive/status/1610646570545942531?t=bbRPn8wLsl7I65nAV_6lVw&s=195. In Texas, over 1.5 millions houses got heated through the activities of bitcoin mining amidst the set of winter this seasonhttps://www.satoshiaction.io/post/bitcoin-miners-return-enough-power-to-heat-1-5-million-homes-during-texas-winter-storm6. On third of January 2023 makes it fourteen years of banking the unbanked which Satoshi Nakamoto has implemented as the first digital decentralized currency bitcoin to the world and bitcoin never loose value or go down https://twitter.com/BitcoinMagazine/status/1610234488923230209?t=zHIbRpicdSNEuwIowbVbHQ&s=197. Bitcoin has been ever green up within the first four days in 2023 as it has not experience downtrend in its price, it's a good indication for a better days ahead this year 2023.https://www.coindesk.com/price/bitcoin/8. Bitcoin remains unstoppable https://twitter.com/MemeingBitcoin/status/1610772893532827659?t=XOw_c4t7-_5BSGOadUr1Ww&s=19

comments.author: kamvreto
comments.body: It's nice to see a lot of positive news about bitcoin and get bitcoin back on track to continue to recover in price. It's news like this that keeps bitcoin afloat. The more adoptions are made and the more investors come in.Quote from: Aanuoluwatofunmi on January 05, 2023, 04:06:11 PM5. In Texas, over 1.5 millions houses got heated through the activities of bitcoin mining amidst the set of winter this seasonhttps://www.satoshiaction.io/post/bitcoin-miners-return-enough-power-to-heat-1-5-million-homes-during-texas-winter-stormnews in Texas, about mining activity in winter which makes it warmer, is of course quite interesting. The bitcoin mining process does not always have a negative effect. this will help reduce the cold temperature in any house mining bitcoins.

comments.author: Dave1
comments.body: It's a good start for this year, but still early, there are a lot of positive news around but when the sentiment of market is negative, this news would not put a dent on the price itself.But we shouldn't be deterred though, it's part of the market cycle and we should be optimistic and look at the long term effect on us by bitcoin itself. We might have to grind another year of bear market but for sure, after all of this the market will bounce back.
